revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Granite Cave |image = [[File:Granite Cave.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of Granite Cave. |tokens = 16,000 |location = South of Route 106. }} '''Granite Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 210,000 |- | Mawile (Boss) || 660,000 |- | Nosepass (Boss) || 660,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Abra * Geodude * Makuhita * Aron * Sableye * Mawile (boss) * Nosepass (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
